name: Codename Darling
description:
Your cover is blown. They are coming for you with the fog. Put on your mask and run, Codename Darling, run.

In this atmospheric endless platformer you play as the mysterious Codename Darling, making your way across the obscured rooftops of a doomed neon city. Keep moving, and don't fall down.

Made for Pocket Jam #5, September 14-15 2020. The theme of the jam was masked, and in this game previous levels are masked over the current one.


Controls:
  • Mobile - tap to start, tap to jump.
  • Browser - space or mouse to start and jump.
Team:
  • Henri Sarasvirta, code [itch.io]
  • Christina Lassheikki, graphics [itch.io] [website]
  • Simo Rintanen, sound design [itch.io]
  • Leo Krechmer, music [itch.io]

Thank you to Chris & Doriki for help with marketability!
